channel.title: Posts on Whatcookie's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Whatcookie's blog

item.title: Why Is AVX 512 Useful for RPCS3?
item.description: It’s often said that the importance of the difference between instruction sets on modern computers is overblown, and it’s hard to actually disagree with this observation. Since 90% of the average program is made up of basic ALU instructions, loads and stores, and branch instructions, and given the fact that the gap between different instruction sets is very small in terms of these basic instructions, it’s easy to agree with this conclusion.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I’ll be posting about things I find interesting, likely programming and emulation related.
